tool_description: Validates bathroom layout against relevant building codes including accessibility, safety clearances, ventilation, and electrical requirements.

jurisdiction.description: Building code jurisdiction: IBC, IRC, local, or ADA

toilet_clearances.description: Toilet clearances [front, sides, back] in inches

shower_size.description: Shower interior dimensions [length, width] in inches

window_area.description: Window area in square feet for natural ventilation

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: Use IBC, IRC, local, or ADA.
Insufficient toilet clearances: Clearances don't meet minimum code requirements.
Invalid shower dimensions: Shower size below minimum code requirements.
Inadequate ceiling height: Ceiling height below code minimum.
Insufficient ventilation: Ventilation capacity below code requirements.
Electrical code violations: Circuit configuration doesn't meet electrical code.
Accessibility non-compliance: Layout doesn't meet ADA requirements when required.
Invalid dimensions: Measurements must be positive numbers within reasonable ranges.
usage: Input jurisdiction, accessibility requirements, and all dimensional and system specifications. The tool validates against applicable building codes and identifies violations.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance result: compliant, violations, or review-needed

violations.description: List of specific code violations found

permit_requirements.description: Required permits for the planned work
